meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Andrea Merrin Mark Milett John Heacock Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #947.

td.p: Andrea Merrin, an actress from New York City, New York
Mark Milett, a hearings & appeals analyst originally from Culver City, California
John Heacock, a waiter & teacher originally from Monkton, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $1,900)

tr.td: FAMOUS QUOTES
ACTORS
BIOLOGY
THE '80S
[The S was the same size as the numbers.]
6-LETTER WORDS
ROCK 'N ROLL EDIBLES
